title: The Ledger of Ghosts
outcome: A forgotten system ledger listing all 'ghosts' resurfaces, exposing detailed behavioral notes and disappearances linked to BCI purges. Public outrage erupts as residents recognize forgotten names, forcing the Council to confront their role and transparency failures.

events.description: Residents discover a hidden digital ledger on city utility servers, revealing the names and disappearance dates of all erased 'ghosts.' Stories of betrayal, favoritism, and sacrifice spread rapidly across social media.

Citywide gatherings are held as residents consult the ledger and confront officials about why certain individuals were erased. Former ghosts lead emotional public forums recounting their experiences in exile from the system.

Oksana Lintz and Lenart Kova initiate a full investigation into BCI erasures, uncovering direct links to past Council orders and the final, unauthorized code changes made from Halden's secure terminal.

Under mounting pressure, the Council makes a public apology for past BCI abuses and promises a permanent memorial for the erased. Trust in the Council hangs in the balance as calls for new leadership intensify.
